**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 99 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- You corrupt yourself with the sin of the [Outer Rifts](/Planes.aspx?ID=45), transforming into a Medium demon battle form. When you cast this spell, choose [abrikandilu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1110), [brimorak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2896), [kithangian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2457), or [vloriak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2727). If you choose kithangian, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the [demon](/Traits.aspx?ID=42) and [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70) traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) actions. You can [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:
  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 [temporary Hit Points](/Rules.aspx?ID=2321), [weakness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2317) 5 to [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375), and weakness 5 to [holy](/Traits.aspx?ID=517).
  • [Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the [enfeebled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
You also gain specific abilities based on the type of demon you choose: - **[Abrikandilu](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1110)** Speed 25 feet; **Melee** jaws ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+12 piercing, and [clumsy](/Conditions.aspx?ID=61) 1 for 1 minute on a critical hit; **Melee** claw ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+12 slashing; **Ranged** hurled debris ([range increment 20 feet](/Rules.aspx?ID=2195), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning. - **[Brimorak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2896)** Speed 30 feet; **Melee** flaming sword ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 fire; **Melee** hoof ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d4+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire. - **[Kithangian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2457)** Speed 30 feet; **Melee** pincer ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 1d12+12 slashing, and you can spend an action after a hit to attempt to [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) the target; **Melee** stinger ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 1d8+12 piercing; all melee Strikes deal 2d6 additional precision damage to [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531). - **[Vloriak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2727)** Speed 25 feet; [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2318) 10 to [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524); **Melee** claw ([unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 2d6+12 piercing plus 1d6 spirit; **Melee** tongue ([agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=526), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=684), [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521)), **Damage** 1d6+12 acid plus 1d6 spirit.
